name: Romantra Perfume cologne Spray Magnifique
description: Experience the captivating fragrance of soft  femininity. The lush, opulent and truly  intoxicating scent leaves your skin delicately  draped in a blissful floral veil with an intensely  herbaceous quality that is so distinctive. Embrace  your classic, pure and delicate aura while  reinforcing your pride in being a woman in  today’s world.*Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
